channel.title: Player Rights Problem?!?
channel.description:
Hey i'v finally managed to create my own server...
but when i change character rights in my source folder to 3.. i log into my character and he cannot do any owner privlages like the ::master option etc.. and then when i log out and open my charatcer notepad up again, its automatically changed its rights back to 0
please help me thankyou

item.title: Player Rights Problem?!?
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

There is probably something in your source defining playerRights on login.

317:
In Client.java, just look for playerRights = 3;
and see if it comes up with something like

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("...")) { playerRights = 3; }
If you can find that, than you change the name to yours.

508:
In your login file, just look for p.rights = 2;
and see if it comes up with something like

if (p.name.equalsIgnoreCase("...")) { p.rights = 2; }
If you can find that, than you change the name to yours.
;D

Read full topic

item.title: Player Rights Problem?!?
item.dc:creator: @a-person a-person
item.description:
@a-person wrote:

Ok

I really need to get back into this :s

item.title: Player Rights Problem?!?
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

[quote=“a-person, post:7, topic:347601”][quote author=iCreatedHorror link=topic=443985.msg3260101#msg3260101 date=1278435199]

You need to log out and save it and log back in

If you have the crown or what ever the you need to edit the command

if you’re on 317 it would look something like

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 2) { addSkillXP(14910000, 0); addSkillXP(14910000, 1); addSkillXP(14910000, 2); }

with more addSkillXP but that is an example

There is a much easier way to give all skills the experience for 99 instead of writing what you have for all of the skills…
[/quote]

I havnt been here for a long time, just trying to help :)[/quote]
Oh, I know. I was just saying there is an easier way so he doesn’t spend the time writing each one.

Read full topic

item.title: Player Rights Problem?!?
item.dc:creator: @abatssk8ter abatssk8ter
item.description:
@abatssk8ter wrote:

You need to edit the commands, make them available for not only rights 2 but also 3.

Read full topic

item.title: Player Rights Problem?!?
item.dc:creator: @Fire_capez Fire capez
item.description:
@Fire_capez wrote:

Your character must be logged out in order for the rights to change sucessfully.
This is because your character autosaves. (Meaning that the rights change back to 0)

Read full topic
